com.nokia.places.media

Interface Review

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Content

    public interface Review
extends Content
    This interface represents review content that provides access to user reviews and ratings about a Place.
    See Also:
    Editorial, Image, Nokia's RESTful Places API - Media collections

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Date getDate()
      This method retrieves the date when the user contributed the review.
      RichText getDescription()
      This method retrieves the content of the review.
      java.lang.String getIsoLanguageCode()
      This method retrieves the language code indicating which language the review has been written in.
      double getRating()
      This method retrieves the rating that the contributor of the review gave to the place.
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      This method retrieves the title of the review that the user contributed.
      User getUser()
      This method retrieves the details of the user who contributed the review.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.nokia.places.Content

        getAttributionText, getSupplier, getSupplierName, getType, getViaLink

    • Method Detail

      • getDate

        java.util.Date getDate()
        This method retrieves the date when the user contributed the review.
        Returns:
        The date of the review.

      • getTitle

        java.lang.String getTitle()
        This method retrieves the title of the review that the user contributed.

        Note: A title for a review is optional. A call to this method could return null.

        Returns:
        The title of the review (could be null).

      • getRating

        double getRating()
        This method retrieves the rating that the contributor of the review gave to the place.
        Returns:
        The rating of the place as estimated by the review contributor.

      • getDescription

        RichText getDescription()
        This method retrieves the content of the review. Depending on the Supplier, the full content might not be displayed and the full review might be available only within the resource to which the optional getViaLink() attribute links.
        Returns:
        The review content.

      • getIsoLanguageCode

        java.lang.String getIsoLanguageCode()
        This method retrieves the language code indicating which language the review has been written in.

        Note: A language code for a review is optional. A call to this method could return null.

        Returns:
        The language code use by the review (could be null).

      • getUser

        User getUser()
        This method retrieves the details of the user who contributed the review.
        Returns:
        An object containing details about the User who contributed the review.
